EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the brochure from TAE, a Honeywell Authorized Service Center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for downloading the brochure from TAE, a Honeywell Authorized Service Center on TPE331 engine. To receive a copy, please click the link below.
Let’s Connect:
Sign up here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to stay in the loop with us, and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. DOWNLOAD THE BROCHURE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/landing-pages/brochures/N61-2533-000-000_TAE_Aerospace_TPE331-bro.pdf]]> Please contact aero.marketing@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aero.marketing@honeywell.com]]> if you experience any issue downloading the assets.
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace
